summary: Tired of those guards asking you if someone took your sweetroll? well now you can give them a sweetroll to the... you know the rest.
descriptionHtml:
adds sweetroll arrows to the game to show those guards that you\'re sweetroll did not infact get stolen.

currently a WIP, one of my testers reported a game freeze, the two others did not. model may look wired, this is because the base sweetroll model is hollow. if anyone would like to lend me a solid sweetroll model or point me in the direction of a free use one it would be much appreciated. working on my own model but i\'m a monkey when it comes to blender.

any suggestions welcome..

to use mod craft the arrows using 5 iron arrows and 1 sweetroll at the forge!

enjoy!

0.2 Added crafting, fixed spell effect and inventory icon.
0.1 Initial release

thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1249070]kpep[/url] for the idea
author: Thechosenone
